name: Station Shooter
description:
Station shooter is an endless shooter where your aim is to shoot rotating stations and avoid asteroids.

Shooting a station gives you 10 points and shooting an asteroid gives you one. Shoot past a station's shields to hit the centre and destroy it.

As you keep playing, more and more asteroids will spawn. Survive as long as you can to get the highest score.

Controls:

Hold in right-click to move in the direction of your mouse pointer.

Hold in left-click to shoot.
